data.name: Skullgirls: Digital Art Compendium
data.detailed_description:
The all new Skullgirls Digital Art Compendium is the ultimate collection of behind the scenes materials that were used to create the stunning, hand-animated fighting game! (including EVERY FRAME of animation in the game)

This compendium features a wide assortment of in-game, concept, and promotional art for all your favorite Skullgirls characters, including the newest addition - Annie of the Stars!

Clocking in at over 7GB of art, it includes:
  • Every Frame of Animation used in game (over 20,000 frames!)
  • Character Concepts, Key Art, and Model Sheets
  • Stage Concepts and Final Background Art
  • Fullscreen Story Mode Art and "Talking Heads"
  • Custom Promotional Art
  • Assorted unique art created for Skullgirls Mobile

NOTE: This compendium will be updated with new content for FREE as new characters and stages become available. See the Skullgirls Season 1 Pass for more details!

To access the Digital Art Compendium:

  • Right-click on Skullgirls 2nd Encore in your Library
  • Select Manage > Browse Local Files
  • Look for the Digital Art Compendium directory
